review: I bought this so I can watch prime.  I seemed to work perfectly for me until it was being used for long periods of time.  It would freeze.  I figured out if I went directly to settings and then to system.  Go down to restart.  It would restart the firestick and at the same time resolve any issues.  Works perfectly after that.  What this needs is an on and off switch.
author: ALEXXO

review: It would have greatly helped if there was an asterisk beside the SLING TV app.  SLING TV which is a subsidiary of DISH satellite is not the same as the SLING built into a DISH receiver.  SLING TV is a pay per month service and not affiliated with the DISH Anywhere app.  The Fire TV devices are wonderful however Amazon needs to do a better job in explaining about their 3rd party apps and where to find out more information about them.  I have already voiced my concerns with DISH however since they are not the creator of the App they have little say in the matter.  Had I done a little more thorough research I would have been able to make a more informed buying decision.  Extremely disappointed customer.
